text.0: of savitar the god the sapient asura we crave this great gift which is worthy of our choice.
text.1: wherewith he freely grants his worshiper defence this with his rays the great god hath vouchsafed to us.
text.2: sustainer of the heaven lord of the whole worlds life the sage he putteth on his goldencoloured mail.
text.3: clearsighted spreading far filling the spacious realm savitar hath brought forth bliss that deserveth laud.
text.4: he hath filled full the regions of the heaven and earth the god for his own strengthening waketh up the hymn.
text.5: savitar hath stretched out his arms to cherish life producing with his rays and lulling all that moves.
text.6: lighting all living creatures neer to be deceived savitar god protects each holy ordinance.
text.7: he hath stretched out his arms to all the folk of earth and with his laws observed rules his own mighty course.
text.8: savitar thrice surrounding with his mightiness midair three regions and the triple sphere of light.
text.9: sets the three heavens in motion and the threefold earth and willingly protects us with his triple law.
text.10: most gracious god who brings to life and lulls to rest he who controls the world what moves not and what moves.
text.11: may he vouchsafe us sheltersavitar the godfor tranquil life with triple bar against distress.
text.12: with the years seasons hath savitar god come nigh may he prosper our home give food and noble sons.
text.13: may he invigorate us through the days and nights and may he send us opulence with progeny.
